document_data.caption: A map showing the Meirig Peatlands on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Meirig Peatlands
document_data.mainbody: The '''Meirig Peatlands''' was a large swamp located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The swamp was found in western Gwynneth along the coast of the [[Trackless Sea]] and [[Corwell Firth]]. Much of the swamp's north and eastern border abutted [[the Shrouded Lands]]. The Meirig Peatlands was fed by several unnamed rivers flowing down from [[the Highlands]] to the east.
